title: 164 - Hasbula Goes to Australia
description: Todays ship is sailed by none other than the Pal of the Pal’s Gumpy. Sadly Pat, Zito and Connor could not join the boys as they are on their way to Huston for an episode of Smack DAHN. Todays Pod starts off with the boys discussing how their week has been going and catching up on all of the show and movies they have been keeping up with. The boys then jump right into the Pod FOD that’s made up from all of the latest things popping off on the World Wide Web. Today’s FOD covers all things form a home made fart cycle, Bill, Mitt and Foxy debating tornados, fish dropping from the sky and much much more. The episode closes off with a beautiful Australian themed mad-lib. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Friday, Cheers.
